SEARCH
Package com.csse3200.game.entities.factories

Class SummonFactory

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.entities.factories.SummonFactory
public final class SummonFactory extends Object
Factory class for creating Engineer-related summon entities such as:
  • Melee summons (e.g., drones or barricades)
  • Directional turrets
  • Currency-generating bots
  • Ghost previews for placement

All entities created here are preconfigured with the appropriate physics, rendering, and combat components.

  • Method Details

    • createMeleeSummon

      public static Entity createMeleeSummon(String texturePath, boolean colliderSensor, float scale)
      Creates a simple melee summon (e.g., a close-range bot or barricade).

      These entities are static (non-moving) and deal touch damage upon contact. They automatically despawn when their HP reaches zero.

      Parameters:
      texturePath - Path to the summon texture.
      colliderSensor - Whether the collider should act as a sensor (non-solid).
      scale - Scale factor for the summon sprite.
      Returns:
      The created melee summon entity.

    • createDirectionalTurret

      public static Entity createDirectionalTurret(String texturePath, float scale, float attackCooldown, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 fireDirection)
      Creates a directional turret that fires projectiles in a fixed direction.

      The turret uses a TurretAttackComponent for firing bullets and a FourWayCycleComponent to automatically rotate its attack direction (Up → Right → Down → Left).

      Parameters:
      texturePath - Path to the turret texture.
      scale - Scale factor for the turret sprite.
      attackCooldown - Time interval (in seconds) between attacks.
      fireDirection - Initial firing direction.
      Returns:
      The created turret entity.

    • createCurrencyBot

      public static Entity createCurrencyBot(String texturePath, float scale, Entity owner, CurrencyComponent.CurrencyType currencyType, int amountPerTick, float intervalSec)
      Creates a currency-generating robot that periodically produces in-game currency for its owner (typically the player).

      Includes OwnerComponent to link it to its summoner and CurrencyGeneratorComponent to handle timed currency production.

      Parameters:
      texturePath - Path to the robot texture.
      scale - Scale factor for the sprite.
      owner - The player entity that owns this bot.
      currencyType - Type of currency generated (e.g., METAL_SCRAP).
      amountPerTick - Amount of currency produced each cycle.
      intervalSec - Time interval (in seconds) between generations.
      Returns:
      The created currency bot entity.

    • createMeleeSummonGhost

      public static Entity createMeleeSummonGhost(String texturePath, float scale)
      Creates a translucent ghost entity for summon placement preview.

      The ghost entity does not interact physically (sensor-only collider) and is typically used to show where a summon will be placed.

      Parameters:
      texturePath - Path to the ghost texture.
      scale - Scale factor for the preview.
      Returns:
      The created ghost summon entity.
